barista_record.SQL_SELECT: SELECT opt_invhdr.firm_id, opt_invhdr.ar_type, opt_invhdr.customer_id, arm_custmast.customer_name, opt_invhdr.order_no, opt_invhdr.ar_inv_no, opt_invhdr.trans_status, opt_invhdr.invoice_type, opt_invhdr.ordinv_flag, opt_invhdr.total_sales, opt_invhdr.order_date, opt_invhdr.shipmnt_date, opt_invhdr.invoice_date, opt_invhdr.misc_no, opt_invhdr.job_no, opt_invhdr.ord_taken_by, opt_invhdr.customer_po_no, opt_invhdr.customer_rel_no, opt_invhdr.tax_amount, opt_invhdr.freight_amt, opt_invhdr.discount_amt[$0a$]FROM opt_invhdr[$0a$]LEFT JOIN arm_custmast ON arm_custmast.firm_id=opt_invhdr.firm_id AND arm_custmast.customer_id=opt_invhdr.customer_id

SELECT opt_invhdr.firm_id, opt_invhdr.ar_type, opt_invhdr.customer_id, opt_invhdr.order_no, opt_invhdr.ar_inv_no, opt_invhdr.total_sales, opt_invhdr.order_date, opt_invhdr.shipmnt_date, opt_invhdr.invoice_date, opt_invhdr.misc_no, opt_invhdr.job_no, opt_invhdr.ord_taken_by, opt_invhdr.customer_po_no, opt_invhdr.customer_rel_no, opt_invhdr.tax_amount, opt_invhdr.freight_amt, opt_invhdr.discount_amt, opt_invhdr.trans_status[$0a$]FROM opt_invhdr

SELECT opt_invdet.firm_id, opt_invdet.ar_type, opt_invdet.customer_id, opt_invdet.order_no, opt_invdet.ar_inv_no, opt_invdet.internal_seq_no, opt_invdet.warehouse_id, opt_invdet.item_id, ivm_itemmast.item_desc, opt_invdet.order_memo, opt_invdet.unit_price, opt_invdet.qty_ordered, opt_invdet.qty_backord, opt_invdet.qty_shipped, opt_invdet.ext_price[$0a$]FROM opt_invdet[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivm_itemmast ON ivm_itemmast.firm_id=opt_invdet.firm_id AND ivm_itemmast.item_id=opt_invdet.item_id

SELECT opt_invdet.firm_id, opt_invdet.trans_status, opt_invdet.ar_type, opt_invdet.customer_id, arm_custmast.customer_name, opt_invdet.ar_inv_no, opt_invdet.order_no, opt_invdet.internal_seq_no, opt_invdet.item_id, ivm_itemmast.item_desc, opt_invdet.order_memo, opt_invdet.qty_shipped, opt_invdet.ext_price[$0a$]FROM opt_invdet[$0a$]LEFT JOIN arm_custmast ON arm_custmast.firm_id=opt_invdet.firm_id AND arm_custmast.customer_id=opt_invdet.customer_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivm_itemmast ON ivm_itemmast.firm_id=opt_invdet.firm_id AND ivm_itemmast.item_id=opt_invdet.item_id

SELECT opt_invhdr.firm_id, opt_invhdr.ar_type, opt_invhdr.customer_id, opt_invhdr.order_no, opt_invhdr.ar_inv_no, opt_invhdr.trans_status, opt_invhdr.invoice_type, opt_invhdr.ordinv_flag, opt_invhdr.order_date, opt_invhdr.shipmnt_date, opt_invhdr.invoice_date, opt_invhdr.customer_po_no, opt_invhdr.total_sales, opt_invhdr.tax_amount, opt_invhdr.freight_amt, opt_invhdr.discount_amt[$0a$]FROM opt_invhdr

SELECT opt_invhdr.firm_id, opt_invhdr.ar_type, opt_invhdr.customer_id, opt_invhdr.order_no, opt_invhdr.ar_inv_no, opt_invhdr.order_date, opt_invship.name, opt_invship.addr_line_1, opt_invship.addr_line_2, opt_invship.addr_line_3, opt_invship.addr_line_4, opt_invship.city, opt_invship.state_code, opt_invship.zip_code, opt_invship.cntry_id[$0a$]FROM opt_invhdr[$0a$]LEFT JOIN opt_invship ON opt_invship.firm_id=opt_invhdr.firm_id AND opt_invship.customer_id=opt_invhdr.customer_id AND opt_invship.order_no=opt_invhdr.order_no AND opt_invship.ar_inv_no=opt_invhdr.ar_inv_no AND opt_invship.address_type='S'[$0a$]WHERE opt_invhdr.shipto_type='M'[$0a$]

SELECT opt_invhdr.firm_id, opt_invhdr.ar_type, opt_invhdr.customer_id, opt_invhdr.ar_inv_no, opt_invhdr.invoice_date, opt_invhdr.order_no, opt_invhdr.order_date, opt_invhdr.total_sales, opt_invhdr.customer_po_no[$0a$]FROM opt_invhdr

SELECT opt_invhdr.firm_id, opt_invhdr.ar_type, opt_invhdr.customer_id, opt_invhdr.ar_inv_no, opt_invhdr.invoice_date, opt_invhdr.order_no, opt_invhdr.order_date, opt_invhdr.total_sales, opt_invhdr.customer_po_no[$0a$]FROM opt_invhdr

SELECT opt_invhdr.firm_id, opt_invhdr.ar_type, opt_invhdr.customer_id, opt_invhdr.ar_inv_no, opt_invhdr.invoice_date, opt_invhdr.order_no, opt_invhdr.order_date, opt_invhdr.total_sales, opt_invhdr.customer_po_no[$0a$]FROM opt_invhdr

SELECT opt_invdet.firm_id, opt_invdet.trans_status, opt_invdet.customer_id, arm_custmast.customer_name, opt_invdet.order_no, opt_invdet.warehouse_id, opt_invdet.item_id, ivm_itemmast.item_desc, ivm_itemmast.unit_of_sale, opt_invdet.qty_backord, [QTY_ON_HAND] AS qty_available, [QTY_ON_HAND] AS total_available, ivm_itemwhse.qty_on_hand, ivm_itemwhse.qty_commit, ivm_itemwhse.qty_on_order, opt_invdet.ar_type, opt_invdet.ar_inv_no, opt_invdet.internal_seq_no, opt_invdet.line_code, opt_invdet.line_no, opt_invdet.qty_shipped, opt_invdet.order_memo[$0a$]FROM opt_invdet[$0a$]LEFT JOIN arm_custmast ON arm_custmast.firm_id=opt_invdet.firm_id AND arm_custmast.customer_id=opt_invdet.customer_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivm_itemmast ON ivm_itemmast.firm_id=opt_invdet.firm_id AND ivm_itemmast.item_id=opt_invdet.item_id[$0a$]LEFT JOIN ivm_itemwhse ON ivm_itemwhse.firm_id=opt_invdet.firm_id AND ivm_itemwhse.warehouse_id=opt_invdet.warehouse_id AND ivm_itemwhse.item_id=opt_invdet.item_id[$0a$]

SELECT opt_invhdr.firm_id, opt_invhdr.ar_type, opt_invhdr.customer_id, opt_invhdr.ar_inv_no, opt_invhdr.invoice_date, opt_invhdr.order_no, opt_invhdr.order_date, opt_invhdr.total_sales, opt_invhdr.customer_po_no[$0a$]FROM opt_invhdr
